Text.Page:
Okay, here's my plan. If there were fewer {@LinkCreature:42#1100#naga guardians}, it would be a lot easier to reach the naga leaders.

I didn't promise it would be a big, complicated plan, did I? Just trust me. Get rid of as many as you can, and take out whoever they're guarding for good measure.
Thanks, <PCNAME>. I know that couldn't have been easy.
Just kill them one at a time, <PCNAME>. What's bad for {@LinkCreature:42#1100#naga guardians} is good for us.
